name: Club Lipstick VR
description:
Welcome to Club Lipstick VR! This isn't your regular strip club experience! This strip club is set in a strange place, at a strange time, in a strange universe, within a strange dimensional space. There are no bouncers, there isn't a "no-touch" rule, and almost anything goes! Sometimes unexpected visitors come to pay the patrons a visit. Other times space and time themselves behave strangely. Within this dimension, the pockets of patrons never run light, the drinks never ceasing, and all desires met.
Join us at Club Lipstick!
5 standard dancers on-staff!
5 unlockable special dancers!
Dancers have dynamic behavior and chose their routines.
Dancers dynamically remove clothing!
Join one or more dancers in a private room, where almost anything goes!
Friendly staff, can also be invited to a private room!
Toss stacks of money, or make it rain individual bills!
Right and left-handed support, as well as single-handed.
Watch out for rare random occurrences, such as time slowdowns and other effects.
